name: Zombie Playground (#zpg) - 3D Action, Online Battle RPG
blurb: Zombie Playground is a game where you take the role of a kid during a zombie apocalypse as seen through a child's imagination.

rewards.reward: No Reward
Receive a Kickstarter Exclusive Desktop Wallpaper Pack!
You will have your name included in the Zombie Playground "Kickstarter Contributors" credits scroll.  You will also get the previous reward.
STANDARD EDITION gets you a digital copy of the game along with an in-game care package to help kickstart your Zombie Playground adventure!
Receive Kickstarter Exclusive in-game shoes (not glow in the dark).  Receive a bonus xp reward to save up, or spend in the shop.  You will also get all previous rewards.

Receive 2 Kickstarter Exclusive in-game weapons:  "Steeltooth" the double chainsaw bat, and "Jawbreaker" pistols.  At this tier you get 1 additional copy of the game.  You will also get all previous rewards.
This tier includes the previous reward plus a Digital Soundtrack of the game.  With artists like Aesop Rock and Shawn Lee contributing, we can't wait!
Receive Kickstarter Exclusive in-game cape - which will serve the same gameplay purpose as a backpack.  You will also get all previous rewards.

Receive a Kickstarter Exclusive in-game hoodie (not glow in the dark).  Additionally, you will have access to an Exclusive Kickstarter in-game taunt animation.  You will also get all previous rewards.
Receive a Kickstarter Exclusive in-game backpack (not glow in the dark).  At this tier, you will receive 3 additional copies of the game.  You will also get all previous rewards.
Do you like Collector's Editions?  This tier includes the previous rewards plus a Digital Artbook of the game.

Receive Kickstarter Exclusive in-game, glow in the dark Goggles.  You will also get all previous rewards. In-game items associated with and below this tier are also included in the free, reward copies of the game.
Receive the in-game pet "Sunny" the lantern toting puppy (which you will be able to rename in-game).  Don't worry, Sunny has 100% evasion to zombies!  You will also receive all previous rewards.

Receive a Kickstarter Exclusive in-game, glow in the dark Hockey Mask.  You will also get all previous rewards. In-game items associated with and below this tier are also included in the free, reward copies of the game.

Receive a Kickstarter Exclusive in-game, glow in the dark Gas Mask.  You will also get all previous rewards. In-game items associated with and below this tier are also included in the free, reward copies of the game.

This Tier adds "Sunny" the lantern toting puppy for all additional, reward game copies.  That means all your additional reward copies of the game will also have access to Sunny, and every other in-game reward below that Tier.

Receive an exclusive Kickstarter 'Power' outfit (aesthetic only).  This outfit includes both gender styles, has 5 different colors to choose from, and will also be included with all additional, reward copies of the game.  You will also get all previous rewards. (Concept art for this outfit is in Update #13)
You will receive a special Kickstarter in-game merit badge with unique bonus properties (buffs) only available through Kickstarter, and you will receive all previous rewards.

Show your support with in-game glow in the dark "Kickstarter Kicks" (Shoes).  Trust us, having an edge in the dark will be a HUGE plus in this game.  There's only one way to get this item since the Kickstarter gear is for backers only.  Plus receive all of the previous rewards.

Get early access to the ZPG closed ALPHA!  PLUS, your team will never lose track of you in the dark with your nifty in-game glow in the dark "Kickstarter" T-shirt!  You will also get all of the previous rewards.

Since you are getting all of those previous rewards, it seems you're starting to build a nice little glow in the dark Kickstarter outfit.  Well, what better way to further accessorize than an in-game glow in the dark "Kickstarter" Backpack?  At this level, you will also get your name and picture in the illustrious School Yearbook (aka Credits Page)!  'Stay cool!'

Needless to say, all those previous rewards just wouldn't seem complete without in-game glow in the dark... "Kickstarter Weapons"!\r\n\r\nAll of your current and future characters will have access to glow in the dark Kickstarter weapons, exclusive only to Kickstarter.  This will never expire for you.

Get your face on an in-game T-shirt!  Yes, just like at a mall kiosk!  We'll put a photo of you, a loved one, or your beloved pet on a luxurious white cotton, in-game t-shirt for your characters to wear.  You also pick up glow in the dark Kickstarter in-game shorts or skirt!  Plus you will receive all previous rewards.

Want to have access to characters right when they come out and not through some time consuming unlocking process?  At this level we will give you a key that unlocks future character classes as soon as they are released.  Also, we'll give your in-game character the option to use glow in the dark war paint (face paint).  All previous rewards apply here as well.
You get an infinite 'All Access Pass' for the in-game shop!  All items in the game shop are available to you at no experience cost...  Forever!  Plus you get all of the previous rewards.
Design a weapon!  At this level, you will be able to work with our team to design a weapon to be used in-game.  All previous rewards still apply.

Be an in-game member of the (zombie) faculty!  We will model a zombie after your likeness so you can have the strange pleasure of bashing your own face in...  Plus all previous non limited rewards included.

Be an in-game living faculty survivor NPC!  Not everyone is a zombie in the game, and you don't have to be either!  At this level we will model a survivor NPC off of you.  Good job surviving the outbreak!  For now...  All previous non limited rewards included.

Get a portrait of yourself painted by Zombie Playground creator, Jason Chan and put up as a former principal of the school.  Then we will ship you the actual painting!  We will also throw our Massive Black 2012 Halloween Party in your honor, and you will be invited as our distinguished guest right here at MB Headquarters!  (Must be able to travel to the San Francisco area).  In the credits section, you will receive the title "Producer".  All previous non limited rewards included.

We will name the entire School after you.  You must have done something right, 'cause your name is now emblazoned on the School for all eternity!  Be the legend...  In the credits section, you will receive the title "Executive Producer".\r\nAll previous non limited rewards included as well as the party invitation and portrait.

YOU ARE THE SCHOOL PRINCIPAL!  Yes, that's right!  At this level, we will make you the principal of the school.  We will model the principal after your likeness and name him or her after you!  You'll be famous!  In the credits section, you will receive the title "Executive Producer."  All previous non limited rewards included as well as the party invitation and portrait.  If you would like to donate more than $10,000, please contact us.
